title: Crusaders: An Epic History of the Wars for the Holy Lands
itunes:title: Crusaders: An Epic History of the Wars for the Holy Lands
itunes:subtitle: In a talk from our 2019 History Weekend in Winchester, Dan Jones introduces a vivid cast of characters from the medieval conflicts for the Holy Land. Historyextra.com/podcast
description:
In a talk he delivered at our 2019 BBC History Magazine History Weekend in Winchester, historian, author and broadcaster Dan Jones introduces a vivid cast of characters from the medieval conflicts for the Holy Land. Historyextra.com/podcast

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
